courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Python Development First Steps and Development IDE Platform

its the module of program "Professional Diploma in Python Development"
You may join that course separately, or join the full program.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

Course Content:

  • interpreters and IDEs

  • Setting up Anaconda

  • Web-based alternatives to IDEs

  • Navigating the IDE

  • Code literacy

  • Let_s greet the world


Course Author:

Stanisław Marek Halkiewicz

I am a seasoned educator specializing in the domains of econometrics, statistics, statistical programming, and mathematics, boasting an extensive track record exceeding three years. Notably, I have imparted my expertise to students hailing from prestigious global universities, solidifying my standing as a sought-after tutor. I have made significant contributions in research endeavors spanning statistics, econometrics, and statistical programming. Furthermore, my professional trajectory encompasses a diverse spectrum, ranging from project management to business intelligence and Data Science.


Course Description:

Python Development First Steps and Development IDE Platform is a course designed to introduce individuals to the world of Python programming. Python has gained immense popularity in recent years for its simplicity, versatility, and readability. This course is ideal for beginners who are new to programming.


Importance For Companies:

Versatility: Python is versatile and can be used for a wide range of applications, from web development and data analysis to artificial intelligence and automation. Companies can benefit from having Python developers who can adapt to various projects.


Productivity: Python's clean and readable syntax allows developers to write code more quickly and efficiently. This results in faster project development and reduced costs for companies.


Large Ecosystem: Python has a vast ecosystem of libraries and frameworks, making it easier for companies to find solutions to their specific needs. This reduces the need for reinventing the wheel.


Data Analysis and AI: Python is a go-to language for data analysis and machine learning. Companies can leverage Python to extract valuable insights from data and build AI-driven applications.


Community and Support: Python has a strong and active community of developers. Companies can tap into this community for support, resources, and talent recruitment.


Importance For Developers:


Career Opportunities: Learning Python opens up a wide range of career opportunities in various industries. Python developers are in high demand, and their skills are transferable to different domains.


Diversity of Roles: Python developers can work in roles such as web developer, data analyst, data scientist, machine learning engineer, and more. This diversity allows developers to explore different areas of interest.


Ease of Learning: Python's straightforward syntax makes it an ideal choice for beginners in programming. It's also accessible to experienced developers looking to add another language to their skill set.


Continuous Growth: Python is constantly evolving, with new libraries and frameworks being developed. This means that developers who invest in Python education can continue to grow their skill set over time.


Remote Work Opportunities: Python development often allows for remote work, providing developers with flexibility in their careers.


The course "Introduction to Python Development" provides a foundation for individuals looking to embark on a career in programming or expand their skill set. Python's significance in the tech industry, its versatility, and its demand in the job market make it a valuable asset for both companies and developers aiming to excel in today's technology-driven world.

courseDetails.title: Complete Wordpress Website Developer Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn WordPress step by step to make beautiful blogs, websites,e-commerce sites to start your business ONLINE.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the ultimate WordPress course! This course is designed to teach you all the basics and fundamental concepts of WordPress, and how to build a fully functional blogging site and business website from scratch.

We will start by exploring the WordPress interface and its various components and then delve into the essential features of building a blogging site. You will learn how to install and setup WordPress on localhost, create and manage content, and optimize your site for search engines.

Next, we will move on to building a business website using WordPress. You will learn how to choose and customize a theme, create pages, menus, and sidebars, and integrate essential business features such as contact forms and social media.

We will also cover how to migrate your site from localhost to an online server. You will learn how to backup and restore your WordPress site, transfer your files and database, and avoid common migration pitfalls.

In addition, we will explore the domain and hosting setup process. You will learn how to choose the right domain and hosting provider, how to set up your domain and hosting, and how to migrate your site from one hosting provider to another.

The best part of this course is that we add new lectures every now and then based on the requests of our students. We want to make sure that you have access to the latest and most relevant information about WordPress.

And, I personally answer all the questions of students in the discussion section. So, if you have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask and I will do my best to help you out.

Join us today and take your WordPress skills to the next level!
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to learn Wordpress.
Anyone who wants to create Websites, Blogs and E-Commerce sites with Ease.
Anyone who wants to start their Web Design business.
Anyone who wants to become a Web Developer.

courseDetails.title: Intentional Leadership
courseDetails.shortDescription: To be intentional in everything you do as a leader, you need to understand how to be that way.
courseDetails.longDescription:
What does it mean to be an Intentional as a Leader?


How can you be Intentional in Your Leadership?


What are the benefits of this approach to Leadership?


The main aim of this course is to help you understand and develop ways to become a more effective leader, being intentional in your actions.


This is not a trend or a fad topic for anyone going into, already or seeking to become Leadership positions.

It is to help equip Leaders with other tools that will enable them deliver their objectives in a timely, impactful way.


Intentional leadership highlights traits such as:

- Clarity and focus

- The responsibility of designing a framework

- Learning, improvements and continuous research

- Execution and delivery (arguably the most important element)

- Drivers and levers (at work, of your goals, personal, team, of the business et al)

- Outcomes and end goals

- Relentless focus

- Lessons, feedback,  (ongoing)

- Maintaining focus - concentrating on the important things

- Repeat and integrate

How to develop these skills as a Leader.

How to integrate some of these traits into your leadership.


Some and all of these may not be necessary or required immediately or at the same time as a leader, but the above discussed traits or elements if inculcated along with other skills WILL improve your EFFECTIVENESS in LEADERSHIP.
targetAudiences: Everyone
Anyone
New Managers
Founders
Management
Executives
Supervisors
Team Leaders
Team Members

courseDetails.title: YouTube Channel Growth Guide: YouTube Success Masterclass
courseDetails.shortDescription: Maximize Your YouTube Success: Strategic Content Creation, Channel Optimization, and Monetization Techniques
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the secrets to YouTube success with our comprehensive course, "How to Grow a Successful YouTube Channel." Whether you’re an aspiring content creator, a small business owner, or a marketing professional, this course is designed to equip you with the skills and strategies needed to thrive on one of the world’s most powerful platforms.


In today’s digital landscape, YouTube is more than just a video-sharing site; it’s a vibrant community where creators can share their passions, connect with audiences, and generate substantial income. Join us on a transformative journey where you’ll learn how to define your niche, set achievable goals, and create engaging content that captivates your audience.


We start with the fundamentals of establishing your channel, guiding you through the process of selecting a niche that aligns with your interests while also meeting market demand. Setting clear, achievable goals is crucial, and we will show you how to implement SMART goals to keep your channel focused and growth-oriented.


Next, we delve into the essentials of video production, covering everything from choosing the right equipment to filming techniques that make your videos pop. You’ll discover how to create a captivating visual experience that draws viewers in and keeps them watching. Our editing module will equip you with practical skills in using editing software, ensuring you can transform raw footage into polished, professional-looking videos.


But it doesn't stop there! Discover how to optimize your channel for maximum visibility with proven SEO strategies that make your videos stand out in a crowded marketplace. Learn the art of crafting compelling titles and eye-catching thumbnails that drive clicks and increase your subscriber count. You’ll also master the intricacies of YouTube’s algorithm, understanding how to leverage analytics to improve your content and boost engagement.


As you progress, you'll explore diverse monetization options beyond ad revenue, including sponsorships, merchandise sales, and direct viewer support through memberships and crowdfunding. We’ll discuss how to approach potential sponsors and negotiate deals that benefit both you and your brand partners. By the end of this course, you’ll have a well-rounded understanding of how to build, grow, and monetize your YouTube channel, turning your passion into a sustainable income stream.


With easy-to-follow lessons, practical tips, and actionable insights, this course is perfect for anyone eager to make their mark on YouTube. Don’t miss this opportunity to transform your creative ideas into a thriving online presence. Enroll now and start your journey to YouTube success today! Take the first step towards realizing your dreams and join thousands of successful creators who have turned their passion into profit.

Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs
Marketing Professionals

courseDetails.title: Drupal For Beginners - Master Drupal Quickly

Our comprehensive video course, "Drupal For Beginners - Master Drupal Quickly," is designed with beginners in mind and requires no prior experience. We'll take you on a journey from the very basics to becoming a confident Drupal user.

Why Choose Drupal? First, we'll delve into what Drupal is and why you should choose it over other CMS options. You'll discover the countless advantages that make Drupal an ideal choice for your web development projects.

Getting Started with Drupal Next, we'll guide you through the process of installing Drupal on your local machine, ensuring you're ready to explore its endless possibilities. No technical expertise required!

Creating Content with Confidence Content is at the heart of any website, and we'll show you how to create it effortlessly. Learn to craft articles and basic pages while understanding the key differences between them. You'll also explore content revision to roll back to previous versions when needed. Plus, we'll reveal where to source high-quality, royalty-free images and how to format your text for a polished look.

Effortless User Management User management is a breeze with Drupal. Discover how to create users, establish user roles, and assign specific permissions. Empower yourself with the skills to control who can do what on your site.

Mastering Layouts with Blocks We'll unravel the magic of Drupal's block system. Learn how to control your site's layout by placing content, menus, and more with ease, giving your site a professional and customized feel.

Crafting Navigation Menus Navigation is key to user experience. We'll show you how to add links to your menus and create new ones, ensuring that your site is user-friendly and intuitive.

Extending Functionality with Modules Drupal's extensibility is one of its standout features. In this course, you'll gain a fundamental understanding of modules and how to expand your site's capabilities effortlessly.

Personalized Q&A Support We've got you covered with a personalized Q&A session, where our instructor will answer your questions. No query is too basic or advanced, and we're here to ensure your success.

Money-Back Guarantee We're so confident in the value of this course that we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you'll get a full refund—no questions asked.

Request-Based Content Your learning journey is essential to us. If you have specific topics you'd like us to cover, let us know, and we'll consider adding new content to meet your needs.

courseDetails.title: Windows Security
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Windows Security
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the Power of Windows Security: Your Digital Fortress Awaits!

Welcome to "Shielding Your Digital Realm," the definitive course on mastering Windows security. In this transformative journey, we unravel the secrets that turn your digital space into an impenetrable fortress.

Why Enroll Today?

In the dynamic landscape of cybersecurity, understanding Windows security is non-negotiable. Our course provides a comprehensive overview, ensuring you grasp the foundational elements before diving into the specifics.

What You'll Master:

  • UAC (User Account Control): Discover the pivotal role UAC plays as your first line of defense, empowering you to control system changes and safeguard against unauthorized access.

  • Firewall Mastery: Navigate the intricacies of the Windows Firewall, learning how to fortify your system against external threats with confidence and ease.

  • Anti-Virus Tactics: Unleash the potential of your anti-virus software, gaining insights into effective strategies for combating digital threats in real-time.

  • Real World Hacks: Immerse yourself in practical scenarios, exploring real-world hacking techniques and understanding how to counteract them in your digital realm.

courseDetails.title: सीखें WordPress हिन्दी में

courseDetails.longDescription:
आपका स्वागत है आखिरी WordPress कोर्स में! यह कोर्स आपको WordPress के सभी मूल और मौलिक अवधारणाओं को सिखाने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है, और सिर्फ़ ब्लॉगिंग साइट बल्कि व्यापारिक वेबसाइट को शून्य से बनाने के तरीके को सीखने के लिए।

हम पहले WordPress इंटरफ़ेस और उसके विभिन्न घटकों की खोज करेंगे, और फिर ब्लॉगिंग साइट बनाने के महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताओं में प्रवेश करेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि लोकलहोस्ट पर WordPress को कैसे स्थापित और सेटअप करें, सामग्री बनाएं और प्रबंधित करें, और अपनी साइट को सर्च इंजन के लिए अनुकूलित कैसे करें।

अगले, हम WordPress का उपयोग करके व्यापारिक वेबसाइट बनाने के तरीकों पर आगे बढ़ेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि कैसे एक थीम का चयन करें और कस्टमाइज़ करें, पेज, मेनू, और साइडबार बनाएं, और संपर्क फॉर्म्स और सोशल मीडिया जैसे आवश्यक व्यापारिक सुविधाओं को कैसे शामिल करें।

हम यह भी कवर करेंगे कि अपनी साइट को लोकलहोस्ट से ऑनलाइन सर्वर पर कैसे माइग्रेट किया जाए। आप सीखेंगे कि अपनी WordPress साइट को बैकअप और रिस्टोर कैसे करें, अपनी फ़ाइल्स और डेटाबेस को कैसे ट्रांसफ़र करें, और सामान्य माइग्रेशन की सामान्य दिक्कतों से कैसे बचा जा सकता है।

इसके अलावा, हम डोमेन और होस्टिंग सेटअप प्रक्रिया की भी जाँच करेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि सही डोमेन और होस्टिंग प्रदाता का चयन कैसे करें, अपने डोमेन और होस्टिंग को कैसे सेटअप करें, और अपनी साइट को एक होस्टिंग प्रदाता से दूसरे होस्टिंग प्रदाता में कैसे माइग्रेट करें।

इस कोर्स का सबसे अच्छा हिस्सा यह है कि हम अपने छात्रों के अनुरोधों के आधार पर समय-समय पर नए व्याख्यान जोड़ते हैं। हम चाहते हैं कि आपको WordPress के बारे में नवीनतम और सबसे मूल्यवान जानकारी तक पहुँच मिले।

और, मैं व्यक्तिगत रूप से छात्रों के सभी प्रश्नों का उत्तर देता हूँ। इसलिए, अगर आपके पास कोई प्रश्न या चिंता है, तो हमसे पूछने
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to learn WordPress in Hindi.

courseDetails.title: Implementation of Occupational Health and Safety in Industry
courseDetails.shortDescription: Occupational Health and Safety
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course provides a comprehensive overview of Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) principles and their critical role in safeguarding workplaces. Participants will gain a solid understanding of the fundamental concepts, legal framework, and the profound impact of OHS on both individuals and organizations.

The course commences with a clear definition of OHS, delineating its scope and objectives. It delves into the intricate legal and regulatory landscape governing occupational health and safety, emphasizing the importance of compliance. Participants will explore the multifaceted benefits of a robust OHS culture, including enhanced employee morale, reduced accidents, and improved organizational reputation.

A key focus of the course is on the human element of OHS. It underscores the significance of safeguarding workers' physical and mental well-being, highlighting the potential consequences of workplace hazards and the devastating impact of occupational injuries and illnesses. Participants will learn how OHS contributes to creating a positive and supportive work environment, fostering employee engagement and productivity.

Furthermore, the course emphasizes the economic implications of OHS. It explores how effective OHS management can lead to cost savings through reduced accidents, workers' compensation claims, and absenteeism. Additionally, it highlights the role of OHS in enhancing organizational performance and competitiveness.

By the end of this course, participants will have a strong foundation in OHS principles and their practical application. They will be equipped to identify potential hazards, assess risks, and contribute to the development and implementation of effective OHS programs. This knowledge will empower them to create safer and healthier workplaces for themselves and their colleagues.
targetAudiences: Management level
Supervisory level
General workforce

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT i Sztuczna Inteligencja: Kompleksowe szkolenie z AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Zdobądź mistrzostwo w sztucznej inteligencji: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude AI- kompletny przewodnik po sztucznej inteligencji
courseDetails.longDescription:
Kompleksowe szkolenie z ChatGPT i AI:

Czy jesteś gotowy, aby każdy dzień rozpoczynać z osobistym asystentem, który realizuje Twoje zadania z niezrównaną precyzją i szybkością? Sztuczna inteligencja, która potrafi pisać Twoje maile, artykuły czy raporty, tworzyć inspirujące obrazy, analizować skomplikowane dane, dostarczać niestandardowe rozwiązania i rozwiązywać liczne problemy, umożliwiając Ci skupienie się na tym, co naprawdę ważne.

Aby w pełni wykorzystać te korzyści, musisz opanować AI. Wiele osób ekscytuje się, realizuje 2-3 prompty i na tym kończy, nie odkrywając prawdziwego potencjału sztucznej inteligencji. Często wynika to z braku znajomości technik, metod i ustawień, które pozwalają uzyskać najlepsze wyniki z AI.

Celem tego szkolenia jest przekazanie Ci wszystkich kluczy do efektywnej komunikacji z AI, jej optymalnej konfiguracji i pełnego wykorzystania jej możliwości.

Aby to osiągnąć, opracowałem zwięzły i dynamiczny program, który pozwoli Ci zdobyć niezbędną wiedzę i umiejętności do optymalnego wykorzystania AI.

W trakcie tego szkolenia wspólnie omówimy:

  • Jak formułować jasne zapytania do AI, aby uzyskać najlepsze możliwe odpowiedzi.

  • Jak skonfigurować ChatGPT, aby stał się Twoim nauczycielem, współzałożycielem lub zaufanym analitykiem.

  • Jak generować wiele pomysłów i stawać się lepszym w swojej pracy, bardziej produktywnym, szybszym, bardziej trafnym i efektywnym.

  • Jak w pełni wykorzystać multimodalność ChatGPT, aby pisać do niego, mówić, słuchać, przekazywać obrazy i prosić o ich interpretację.

  • Jak zmusić Dall-e lub Copilot do generowania najlepszych możliwych obrazów.

  • Jak znaleźć interesujące alternatywy dla płatnej wersji ChatGPT.

  • Zbadamy także inne AI, takie jak Copilot, Claude czy Gemini.

  • Dowiemy się, jak dostosować ChatGPT do Twoich preferencji i specyficznych potrzeb, aby uzyskać niestandardowe odpowiedzi.

  • Zobaczymy, jak wzmocnić ChatGPT dzięki GPT: jak używać tych aplikacji i nawet jak je tworzyć bez bycia programistą.

  • Przyjrzymy się również bardziej technicznym zagadnieniom na końcu szkolenia, takim jak zarządzanie API, playground, integracja ChatGPT z innymi programami jak Excel czy Google Sheets.

I przede wszystkim, zobaczymy, że to wszystko jest dostępne dla każdego, nawet dla początkujących.

W tym szkoleniu znajdziesz:

  • Konkretne demonstracje.

  • Arkusze techniczne i praktyczne przewodniki do pobrania.


[Aktualizacja: Dodałem filmy dotyczące użycia modelu GPT-4o, który jest następcą wersji GPT-4]

W skrócie, przystępujesz do jasnego, dostępnego i angażującego kursu. Jest on wystarczająco szczegółowy, aby pokryć kluczowe pojęcia, bez zbędnego przeciągania. Niezależnie od Twojego poziomu zaawansowania, czy jesteś początkujący, czy szukasz zaawansowanych technik, to jedyne szkolenie, jakiego potrzebujesz, aby opanować ChatGPT.


Moja prezentacja:

Nazywam się Yassine Rochd, jestem założycielem organizacji szkoleniowej, która pomogła tysiącom osób osiągnąć ich cele zawodowe.

Jestem także pasjonatem technologii. Po ukończeniu studiów magisterskich z finansów i doświadczeniu w konsultingu oraz funduszach inwestycyjnych, odbyłem szkolenie z zakresu web developmentu i spędziłem setki godzin na odkrywaniu i używaniu AI.

Dziś chcę przekazać Ci w jak najjaśniejszy sposób to, czego nauczyłem się przez ostatnie lata.


Certyfikacja i gwarancja:

Po ukończeniu tego szkolenia otrzymasz certyfikat, który będziesz mógł udostępnić na LinkedIn.

Szkolenie jest również bez ryzyka, ponieważ obejmuje 30-dniową gwarancję satysfakcji lub zwrotu pieniędzy.

Masz dożywotni dostęp do szkolenia, zasobów do pobrania oraz przyszłych aktualizacji.

Jesteś o krok od opanowania niezwykle przydatnej technologii, która uczyni Cię bardziej efektywnym, produktywnym i po prostu niezastąpionym.


Szczegółowy opis poszczególnych sekcji tego kursu:

Szybki start z ChatGPT

Dowiedz się, jak szybko opanować ChatGPT w zaledwie kilku filmach. Zanurz się w intuicyjny interfejs ChatGPT i naucz się tworzyć pierwsze prompty, aby w pełni wykorzystać moc AI. Niezależnie od tego, czy chcesz generować tabele, brainstormować, generować pomysły, tłumaczyć i poprawiać teksty, czy też pisać różnorodne treści, z AI będziesz działać szybciej i wydajniej. Zobacz, jak ChatGPT może pomóc w poszukiwaniu pracy i dostosować się do Twoich potrzeb zawodowych, aby zwiększyć efektywność. Zobaczysz, że ChatGPT jest w stanie tworzyć mnóstwo treści, od maili i listów po artykuły i posty na mediach społecznościowych, nie zapominając o pisaniu kodu komputerowego.

Podstawy prompt engineering

Dowiedz się, dlaczego prompt engineering jest kluczowy i jak może przekształcić ChatGPT w prawdziwego eksperta. Zrozum, jak ważny jest kontekst i cele w strukturze interakcji, oraz jak dostosować format i temperaturę, aby zoptymalizować prompty i zmieniać poziom kreatywności modelu. Personalizuj swoje interakcje, opanowując ton i styl, i skorzystaj z 5 praktycznych wskazówek, aby uzyskać jeszcze bardziej trafne odpowiedzi od ChatGPT.

Zaawansowane techniki prompt engineering

W tej sekcji zobaczymy, jak tworzyć prompty, które same generują inne prompty. Przestudiujemy metodę reverse engineering, funkcje wyszukiwania w sieci, interpretacji obrazów i wiele innych zaawansowanych technik.

Dall-e

Przejdziemy do generowania obrazów za pomocą Dall-e. Zobaczysz, jak przejść od przeciętnego wyniku do estetycznych i inspirujących dzieł, jak prosto i szybko modyfikować fragmenty obrazów i optymalizować wyniki. Zbadamy również zaawansowane techniki, które pozwolą na przykład na tworzenie ciągłości w generowaniu postaci fikcyjnych lub komiksowych, dla jeszcze bardziej imponujących rezultatów.

Rozwiązania dla ograniczeń ChatGPT i AI

ChatGPT i inne modele sztucznej inteligencji mają swoje ograniczenia i słabości. W tej sekcji omówimy, jakie są te ograniczenia i jak je przezwyciężyć.

Ciekawe funkcje ChatGPT

Naucz się konfigurować funkcje udostępniania swoich rozmów dla wspólnej pracy z ChatGPT. Wykorzystaj w pełni aplikację mobilną Chat GPT, eksplorując wszystkie oferowane opcje. Odkryj metody tworzenia unikalnych treści za pomocą AI, unikając plagiatu i duplikacji treści.

Copilot i Bing

Copilot oferuje kilka interesujących alternatyw dla płatnych i zaawansowanych funkcji ChatGPT. Zobaczymy, jak skorzystać z partnerstwa Microsoftu i OpenAI, aby uzyskać dostęp do zaawansowanych funkcji sztucznej inteligencji zintegrowanych z wyszukiwarką Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral i inne

W kontynuacji poprzedniej sekcji zbadamy inne AI, takie jak Gemini od Google czy Claude od Anthropic. Zobaczymy ich mocne i słabe strony oraz zbadamy różne przypadki użycia, aby wiedzieć, kiedy lepiej wybrać je zamiast ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Dostosuj ChatGPT do swoich potrzeb i oczekiwań. Naucz się personalizować swoje interakcje, konfigurując swoje custom instructions. Odkryj również, na co zwracać uwagę, aby optymalnie korzystać z AI.

GPTs

Poznaj działanie GPTs, tych mini aplikacji wyspecjalizowanych, które czasem mogą przewyższać ChatGPT. Naucz się krok po kroku tworzyć własne GPT. Opanuj wywołania API, aby maksymalizować możliwości ChatGPT, a na końcu sekcji dowiedz się, jak monetyzować swoje GPTs i szerzej, jak zarabiać dzięki ChatGPT.

Zarządzanie API i Playground

Zbadaj playground ChatGPT i odkryj nowe funkcje, które oferuje. Naucz się wywoływać API ChatGPT o różnym poziomie trudności. Będziesz mógł używać ChatGPT poza interfejsem, tworzyć chatboty na innych stronach lub nawet integrować ChatGPT z innymi programami, takimi jak Google Sheets czy Excel.
targetAudiences: Kurs jest przeznaczony dla każdego, kto chce opanować AI i ChatGPT. Jest odpowiedni dla wszystkich poziomów zaawansowania.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA: Formação Completa em Inteligência Artificial
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domine o ChatGPT, IA e a Engenharia de Prompt: Chat GPT, Dall-e, Copilot | O curso essencial de inteligência artificial
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formação Completa ChatGPT & IAs Generativas

Você está pronto para começar cada dia com um aliado, um assistente pessoal extremamente talentoso, pronto para realizar suas tarefas com precisão e rapidez incomparáveis?

Uma IA capaz de redigir seus e-mails, artigos ou relatórios, criar imagens inspiradoras, analisar dados complexos, programar soluções sob medida e resolver uma infinidade de problemas, permitindo que você se concentre no que realmente importa.

Para aproveitar todos esses benefícios da IA, é essencial dominá-la. Muitas pessoas se empolgam, fazem 2 ou 3 prompts e acabam abandonando o assunto sem descobrir o verdadeiro potencial da inteligência artificial. Esse comportamento muitas vezes revela um desconhecimento das técnicas, métodos e configurações que permitem obter os melhores resultados com a IA.

O objetivo desta formação é fornecer todas as chaves para comunicar eficazmente com a IA, configurá-la da melhor forma e aproveitá-la ao máximo.

Para alcançar isso, concebi um percurso conciso e dinâmico que permitirá a você desenvolver os conhecimentos e competências essenciais para a utilização otimizada da IA.

Durante esta formação, veremos juntos:

  • Como formular requisições claras para a IA para obter as melhores respostas possíveis.

  • Como configurar o ChatGPT para que ele se torne seu professor, co-fundador ou analista de confiança.

  • Como gerar múltiplas ideias e se tornar melhor no seu trabalho, mais produtivo, rápido, relevante e eficiente.

  • Como aproveitar ao máximo a multimodalidade do ChatGPT para escrever, falar, ouvir, transmitir imagens e pedir que ele as interprete.

  • Como fazer o Dall-e ou o Copilot gerar as melhores imagens possíveis.

  • Como encontrar alternativas interessantes para a versão paga do ChatGPT.

  • Exploraremos outras IAs como Copilot, Claude e Gemini.

  • Veremos como adaptar o ChatGPT às suas preferências e necessidades específicas para respostas personalizadas.

  • Vamos descobrir como potencializar o ChatGPT com os GPTs: como usar essas aplicações e até mesmo como criá-las sem ser um desenvolvedor.

  • Exploraremos tópicos mais técnicos no final da formação, como gerenciamento de API, playground, integração do ChatGPT com outros softwares como Excel ou Google Sheets, por exemplo.

  • E, sobretudo, veremos que tudo isso é acessível a todos, mesmo aos iniciantes.

Nesta formação, você encontrará:

  • Demonstrações concretas.

  • Fichas técnicas e guias práticos para download.

[Atualização: Adicionei vídeos sobre o uso do modelo GPT-4o, que sucede a versão GPT-4]

Em resumo, você está prestes a seguir um curso claro, acessível e envolvente. Detalhado o suficiente para cobrir os conceitos essenciais sem se prolongar demais. Não importa o seu nível de partida, seja você iniciante ou esteja em busca de técnicas avançadas, esta é a única formação que você precisará para dominar o ChatGPT.

Minha apresentação:

Meu nome é Yassine Rochd, sou fundador de uma organização de treinamento que ajudou milhares de aprendizes a alcançar seus objetivos profissionais. Sou também apaixonado por tecnologia. Após um mestrado em finanças e experiências em consultoria e fundos de investimento, fiz uma formação em desenvolvimento web e passei centenas de horas descobrindo e utilizando IAs. Hoje, desejo transmitir de forma clara o que aprendi nos últimos anos.

Certificação e Garantia:

  • Ao concluir esta formação, você receberá uma certificação que poderá compartilhar até mesmo no LinkedIn.

  • Esta formação é também sem riscos, pois você tem uma garantia de "satisfação ou reembolso" de 30 dias.

  • Você terá acesso vitalício à formação e aos recursos para download.

Você está a um clique de dominar uma tecnologia extremamente útil que tornará você mais eficiente, mais produtivo e simplesmente indispensável.


Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs

Descubra como funcionam os GPTs, essas miniaplicações hiperespecializadas que podem, às vezes, superar o ChatGPT. Aprenda a criar seu próprio GPT passo a passo. Domine as chamadas de API para maximizar as capacidades do ChatGPT e, ao final da seção, descubra como monetizar seus GPTs e, mais amplamente, como ganhar dinheiro com o ChatGPT.

Gestão de API & Playground

Explore o playground do ChatGPT e descubra as novas funcionalidades que ele oferece. Aprenda a chamar a API do ChatGPT com níveis crescentes de dificuldade. Assim, você poderá usar o ChatGPT fora da interface, criar um chatbot em outro site ou até mesmo integrar o ChatGPT a outros softwares, como Google Sheets ou Excel, por exemplo.
targetAudiences: Qualquer pessoa que deseje dominar a IA e o ChatGPT. Esta formação é adequada para todos os níveis.

To do this well, there are a number of considerations, and we cover them all in this course. Within the course, we will cover the following:

- What is RPA, a process & the difference between current & future state?

- How to model your future state process, based on ALL work done prior.

- How to successfully review and annotate your processes, have others do this and present back to a range of audiences.

- How to choose the right mapping method, gather the team and run the workshop.

- How to have a future state process, designed to your needs, ready for the developers to take over.

At the end of this course, you will have full confidence to map out the current state process in scope for your RPA work and gather feedback, comments and requirements on this. You will also have the confidence to work with your colleagues to build out a future state process, fit for purpose and ready for delivery. Being able to do this work is an essential skill in automation, RPA and general process improvement, so ensure you upskill in this area now.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Empathy and Emotional Intelligence for Project Managers


In today's complex project environments, technical expertise alone is not enough to ensure success. Project managers are increasingly required to navigate diverse teams, manage stakeholder expectations, and lead projects to successful completion while fostering a positive work environment.


The key to achieving these objectives lies in mastering empathy and emotional intelligence (EI).


Our course, "Empathy and Emotional Intelligence for Project Managers," is designed to equip you with the essential skills to enhance your leadership effectiveness and project outcomes.

This course will provide you with a deeper understanding of how empathy and emotional intelligence play a critical role in building strong relationships, resolving conflicts, and motivating your team. We explore the core concepts of emotional intelligence, including self-awareness, self-regulation, motivation, empathy, and social skills.

We examine practical situations and learn how to apply these concepts to real-world project management scenarios, enabling you to better understand the emotions and perspectives of your team members and stakeholders.


The course offers practical exercises and tools to help you develop and strengthen your empathy and emotional intelligence. We discuss and encourage self-assessment through Emotional Quotient (EQ), and reflective practices that will challenge you to grow as a leader. By the end of the course, you will have the skills to create a more cohesive and motivated project team, leading to improved project performance and stakeholder satisfaction.

Whether you are an experienced project manager or new to the role, this course will provide you with valuable insights and techniques to enhance your leadership capabilities.


The areas we cover in this course include:

  • Project Manager - Roles and Responsibilities

  • Functions Associated with Projects

  • The Project Manager

  • Developing Empathy and Practice Exercises

  • Emotional Intelligence

  • Emotional Quotient and lots more.

Enrol today to unlock the power of Empathy and Emotional intelligence within your organisation and especially to enhance your Project Management performance.

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship, Startup, Business Module, Growth
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship is a program designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills, strategies, and visionary thinking required to navigate the intricate world of modern corporate entrepreneurship. This course offers a deep exploration of the dynamic landscape of corporate innovation and entrepreneurship, covering an  array of topics that are crucial for individuals aiming to spearhead innovation, drive growth, and foster entrepreneurial cultures within established organizations.


Course Outline:

Understanding Modern Corporate Entrepreneurship:

The Role of Innovation: Analyzing the central role of innovation as the driving force behind corporate entrepreneurship and market disruption. Distinguishing Entrepreneurship from Intrapreneurship.

Comparative Analysis: Differentiating between external entrepreneurship and internal intrapreneurship, emphasizing their distinct attributes and applications.

Real-world Case Studies: Exploring diverse examples of both entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship to showcase their practical implications.


Exploring Intrapreneurship Types and Case Studies:

Categories of Intrapreneurial Endeavors: Investigating various forms of intrapreneurship, including product innovation and process enhancement.

Intrapreneurship Success Stories: Examining case studies of successful intrapreneurial initiatives within renowned organizations across industries.


Challenges of Cultivating Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Identifying Obstacles: Analyzing the inherent challenges that organizations face when attempting to foster a culture of corporate entrepreneurship.

Strategies for Overcoming Challenges: Developing proactive strategies to address resistance to change, risk aversion, and organizational inertia.


Taxonomy of Intrapreneurial Personalities:

Intrapreneurial Archetypes: Defining different profiles of intrapreneurs, including idea generators, project champions, and disruptive catalysts.

Nurturing Intrapreneurial Talent: Strategies for recognizing and nurturing individuals with intrapreneurial potential within the workforce.


Nurturing and Leading Intrapreneurs:

Fostering a Supportive Ecosystem: Creating an environment that encourages creativity, experimentation, and calculated risk-taking.

Empowerment Strategies: Providing intrapreneurs with resources, autonomy, and mentorship to propel their innovative endeavors.


Becoming an Intrapreneurial Leader:

Personal Transformation: Cultivating the mindset and skillset necessary for individuals to lead with intrapreneurial spirit within their roles.

Influence and Impact: Strategies for inspiring teams, driving change, and championing innovation from within.


Diverse Models of Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Frameworks for Integration: Exploring a spectrum of models and frameworks organizations can adopt to infuse entrepreneurial principles into their DNA.

Case Studies: Analyzing the practical implementation of various models in successful corporate entrepreneurship initiatives.


Unlocking Growth with Strategic Innovation:

Growth Hacking Strategies: Delving into the innovative techniques and agile approaches that drive rapid business expansion.

Engines of Growth: Investigating the mechanisms that fuel accelerated growth in startups and established enterprises.

Market Expansion Theories and Growth Matrices:


Market Penetration vs. Expansion:

Exploring market expansion theories and their pivotal role in strategic decision-making for growth.

Growth Matrix Applications: Applying growth matrices to identify growth opportunities, allocate resources, and diversify product portfolios.


Corporate Venturing and Innovation Ecosystems:

Corporate Venturing Strategies: Understanding the concept of corporate venturing and its impact on driving innovation through external partnerships.

Navigating Innovation Ecosystems: Examining how organizations can collaborate with startups, academia, and research centers to fuel innovation.


Importance for Companies and Employees:

The landscape of modern business is marked by rapid technological advancements, evolving customer preferences, and dynamic competitive pressures. In such an environment, corporate entrepreneurship stands as a beacon of resilience and adaptability for organizations. The Comprehensive Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence serves as a critical learning pathway for companies seeking to stay at the forefront of innovation and leverage entrepreneurial agility to secure sustainable growth.


For Companies:

Cultivating Innovation Culture: The course equips companies with the tools and methodologies to foster an innovation-driven culture, enabling them to stay ahead of disruption and drive continuous improvement.

Seizing New Opportunities: Organizations that embrace corporate entrepreneurship are better positioned to identify emerging market trends, seize untapped opportunities, and create innovative solutions that resonate with customers.

Navigating Disruption: The skills gained from this course empower companies to navigate disruptive forces by fostering an agile mindset, encouraging creative problem-solving, and capitalizing on change.


For Employees:

Career Acceleration: Individuals equipped with corporate entrepreneurship skills become invaluable assets to their organizations. They are poised to take on leadership roles, drive strategic initiatives, and contribute significantly to their companies' growth trajectories.

Entrepreneurial Skillset: Learning the art of corporate entrepreneurship imparts a versatile skillset that transcends job titles. Professionals gain the ability to identify market gaps, propose innovative solutions, and drive change even from within established hierarchies.

Personal Branding: Embracing corporate entrepreneurship fosters a reputation for being a proactive, innovative, and dynamic professional. This can open doors to exciting career opportunities and help individuals stand out in competitive job markets.


Leveraging Corporate Entrepreneurship for Career and Business Ventures:

The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship  not only equips individuals with skills to thrive within organizations but also empowers them to embark on entrepreneurial journeys of their own.


Career Advancement: Professionals who demonstrate a keen understanding of corporate entrepreneurship principles are more likely to be considered for leadership positions. Their ability to drive innovation and adapt to changing business landscapes makes them indispensable assets to any organization.


Entrepreneurial Endeavors: Armed with the mindset and skillset of corporate entrepreneurship, individuals are well-equipped to transition from being employees to becoming successful entrepreneurs. The course nurtures the spirit of calculated risk-taking, resource optimization, and strategic thinking – all essential components for entrepreneurial success.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence offers a transformative learning experience that bridges the gap between traditional business approaches and the demands of a rapidly evolving market. It empowers companies to become innovation powerhouses and individuals to carve out exceptional career trajectories or entrepreneurial journeys. Enroll in this program to embark on a transformative journey that merges innovation, leadership, and business acumen into a potent catalyst for growth and success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at management, corporate management, corporate culture, business and for everyone who wants to improve skills and knowledge at management.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to unlock the full potential of digital products and build a profitable online business? Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a freelancer, or an established business owner looking to diversify your revenue streams, this course is designed to teach you everything you need to know about creating, marketing, and selling digital products effectively. Digital products are the key to achieving financial freedom, and this course will help you build and scale your digital product business, step by step.


In Sales Masterclass: How to Sell Digital Products, you will learn the essential strategies and techniques to turn your ideas into profitable digital products that can generate passive income. Whether you're interested in creating eBooks, online courses, digital art, software, templates, or any other digital product, this course covers every aspect of the process, from inception to scaling your sales.


With 12 comprehensive modules and actionable insights throughout, you will discover how to identify high-demand niches, build a loyal audience, and develop digital products that resonate with your target market. You will also dive deep into essential aspects of digital product sales, including effective pricing strategies, creating compelling sales funnels, driving targeted traffic, and leveraging marketing platforms like email, affiliate programs, and paid advertising.


As you progress through the course, you’ll also gain practical knowledge about optimizing your sales processes, fine-tuning your customer engagement, and building systems that maximize customer retention and lifetime value. You’ll learn how to analyze performance metrics, conduct A/B testing, and adjust your strategies for continuous improvement.


By the end of this course, you’ll have all the tools and knowledge you need to confidently start and grow your digital product business. You'll understand how to manage the entire lifecycle of your digital products—from conceptualization and creation to launching, marketing, and scaling. Whether you're looking to monetize your expertise, create digital products as a side hustle, or transition to a full-time online business, this course provides a step-by-step blueprint for success.


What You’ll Learn:


  • How to identify profitable digital product ideas and evaluate market demand

  • The best practices for creating high-quality digital products that stand out in the marketplace

  • How to price your products effectively to maximize revenue while offering value to customers

  • Strategies for building and optimizing sales funnels that convert visitors into paying customers

  • How to leverage digital marketing techniques including email marketing, social media, and paid ads to drive traffic and sales

  • How to implement affiliate marketing programs to expand your reach and grow your business faster

  • Tips for building strong customer relationships and providing exceptional post-purchase support that encourages repeat business and referrals

  • How to measure performance, conduct A/B testing, and use data to optimize your sales strategies

  • Ways to scale your digital product business and automate repetitive tasks for better efficiency


Why This Course Is for You: This course is perfect for aspiring entrepreneurs, freelancers, content creators, and small business owners who are eager to break into the world of digital product sales. Whether you're just getting started with your online business or looking to take your existing business to the next level, this course will help you gain the skills and knowledge needed to succeed.


If you’ve ever wondered how to sell digital products that people will love and pay for, or if you’ve struggled with marketing your products online, this course will provide you with a roadmap for turning your ideas into a profitable business. The strategies covered in this course are actionable and designed for anyone, regardless of prior experience. You’ll have the chance to learn at your own pace, with clear and engaging lessons that you can apply to your business immediately.


Enroll today and start building your digital product empire. Whether you're looking to supplement your income or create a full-time business, this course will help you turn your passion and knowledge into products that sell—giving you the freedom to work on your terms and achieve the lifestyle you desire.
targetAudiences: Aspiring Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners: Individuals who are looking to start or grow an online business and want to learn how to create and sell digital products to generate passive income. This group may include people with limited resources who want to minimize startup costs and avoid the complexities of physical product sales

Freelancers and Content Creators: Creators such as bloggers, YouTubers, podcasters, and social media influencers who want to monetize their audience by offering digital products like eBooks, courses, or templates. They will learn how to market, sell, and scale their digital products effectively

Established Businesses Looking to Expand Their Offerings: Companies that already offer physical products or services but want to diversify their revenue streams by introducing digital products (e.g., digital downloads, online courses, or software). courseDetails.title: Android P - Programming, Development and Certification
courseDetails.shortDescription: New Features Available on Android P Mobile Development
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is meticulously designed to introduce you to the latest features released in the Developer Preview for the upcoming Android P release, ensuring your app stays at the cutting edge of technological advancements. As mobile technology continues to evolve, it is crucial for developers to keep pace with new features and functionalities to maintain competitive and user-friendly applications. This course provides the knowledge and practical skills required to achieve this.


We begin with an in-depth exploration of the new Android Studio and the Pixel 2 Emulator. Android Studio, the official integrated development environment (IDE) for Google's Android operating system, comes with a range of enhancements in its latest version. The Pixel 2 Emulator, meanwhile, allows developers to test their applications on a virtual device that simulates the Pixel 2’s hardware and software environment. By understanding these tools, you can streamline your development process and optimize your workflow for maximum efficiency.


One of the key features we'll cover is the Display Cutout, also known as the "notch." With the increasing trend of edge-to-edge screens, many devices now come with a display cutout at the top for cameras and sensors. This course will show you how to design your app to accommodate various screen shapes and sizes, ensuring that content is displayed optimally without being obscured by the cutout. You'll learn how to use the WindowInsets class to manage cutouts and create a seamless user experience across different devices.


The Image Decoder API is another significant feature in Android P. It provides a modern way to decode images, offering better performance and additional functionalities compared to the BitmapFactory class. The Image Decoder supports animated images and allows for scaling and post-processing of images during decoding. In this course, you'll learn how to implement the Image Decoder API to handle images more efficiently, reducing memory usage and improving the overall performance of your app.


Notifications have been a core feature of Android for a long time, and with Android P, they have become even more powerful. The updated notifications system includes new features such as support for images and smart replies, making it easier for users to interact with notifications without opening the app. This course will guide you through the process of creating and managing these richer, more interactive notifications. You'll learn how to use the Notification.Builder class to customize notifications with images, action buttons, and inline replies, enhancing user engagement and improving the overall user experience.


In addition to these key features, the course will also touch on other noteworthy enhancements in Android P, such as improved security measures, support for the new HEIF image format, and enhancements to the Autofill framework. By the end of this course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of the new features in Android P and how to integrate them into your projects effectively.


Whether you are an experienced developer or just starting your journey in Android development, this course offers valuable insights and practical skills. By staying up-to-date with the latest tools and features, you can ensure your app remains relevant and competitive in the ever-evolving mobile landscape. Join us to master the new features of Android P and take your app development skills to the next level.
targetAudiences: Anyone who is looking for new features of Android P
Someone who wants to keep up with the new features added in Android P

  • Desalination is a technology that has developed greatly since its apparition. Today, it is a reliable water treatment technique that allows the production of drinking water from oceans and helps with water conservation and security.


  • the course explores how desalination by reverse osmosis technology helps produce freshwater from oceans alleviates water scarcity challenges and contributes to business thriving around the world.


  • This course also discusses water supply through desalination from different angles:  environmental, economic, and energetic, which can be useful for professionals looking for insights on water conservation in the context of Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) considerations for businesses

Course Author:

Stanisław Marek Halkiewicz

I am a seasoned educator specializing in the domains of econometrics, statistics, statistical programming, and mathematics, boasting an extensive track record exceeding three years. Notably, I have imparted my expertise to students hailing from prestigious global universities, solidifying my standing as a sought-after tutor. I have made significant contributions in research endeavors spanning statistics, econometrics, and statistical programming. Furthermore, my professional trajectory encompasses a diverse spectrum, ranging from project management to business intelligence and Data Science.


Course Description:

Introduction to Python Development is a course designed to introduce individuals to the world of Python programming. Python has gained immense popularity in recent years for its simplicity, versatility, and readability. This course is ideal for beginners who are new to programming.


Importance For Companies:

Versatility: Python is versatile and can be used for a wide range of applications, from web development and data analysis to artificial intelligence and automation. Companies can benefit from having Python developers who can adapt to various projects.


Productivity: Python's clean and readable syntax allows developers to write code more quickly and efficiently. This results in faster project development and reduced costs for companies.


Large Ecosystem: Python has a vast ecosystem of libraries and frameworks, making it easier for companies to find solutions to their specific needs. This reduces the need for reinventing the wheel.


Data Analysis and AI: Python is a go-to language for data analysis and machine learning. Companies can leverage Python to extract valuable insights from data and build AI-driven applications.


Community and Support: Python has a strong and active community of developers. Companies can tap into this community for support, resources, and talent recruitment.


Importance For Developers:


Career Opportunities: Learning Python opens up a wide range of career opportunities in various industries. Python developers are in high demand, and their skills are transferable to different domains.


Diversity of Roles: Python developers can work in roles such as web developer, data analyst, data scientist, machine learning engineer, and more. This diversity allows developers to explore different areas of interest.


Ease of Learning: Python's straightforward syntax makes it an ideal choice for beginners in programming. It's also accessible to experienced developers looking to add another language to their skill set.


Continuous Growth: Python is constantly evolving, with new libraries and frameworks being developed. This means that developers who invest in Python education can continue to grow their skill set over time.


Remote Work Opportunities: Python development often allows for remote work, providing developers with flexibility in their careers.


The course "Introduction to Python Development" provides a foundation for individuals looking to embark on a career in programming or expand their skill set. Python's significance in the tech industry, its versatility, and its demand in the job market make it a valuable asset for both companies and developers aiming to excel in today's technology-driven world.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at development or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Drinking Water Explained for ESG Water Conservation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the Basics of Water Supply and Treatment for Improved ESG Water Conservation and Management
courseDetails.longDescription:
• This course belongs to a collection of courses on Water Management and Conservation from an ESG perspective and it includes: Drinking Water Supply Explained + Desalination Explained + Wastewater & Sanitation Explained


  • The course addresses the importance of drinking safe water management from different angles (technological, environmental, economical, social) for public entities and businesses, which falls within the framework of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) and might interest professionals looking for insight on water conservation in businesses.


  • The course explores data about access to safe drinking water around the world


  • The course highlights  the importance of providing safe water to consumers and the risks of untreated water


  • The course also presents the technology needed to treat and manage drinking water


  • Economic, environmental, and governance challenges from different angles are presented as well to shed light on the importance of providing safe water for domestic use and businesses.


  • The following course plan has been adopted:


01  Introduction

02  Access to safe drinking water around the world

03  What are the risks of unsafe drinking water

04  Narutal and urban water cycles

05  Drinking water treatment process

06  Challenges of providing safe water

07  Saving our water and acting responsibly

08  Conclusion & references


By the end of this course:


- You will have more knowledge about the importance of  water in domestic, industrial and agricultural use;

- You will also learn why it is important to ensure safe water to avoid the dangerous consequences of unsafe water.

- You will also become more aware of the different challenges that threaten safe water supply around the world and how you can help save water at your home and act responsibly.

- You will gain insight into different environmental and economic challenges for water management and conservation.

- This course can also interest learners looking for knowledge on seawater and brackish desalination by reverse osmosis membrane technology, as classic pre-treatment can have many similarities with the drinking water treatment process.

- keywords: water management, water conservation, water treatment, health, engineering, sustainability, ESG


Important Notice:


This course has been prepared with a specific audience in mind: learners looking for general knowledge about drinking water, importance of safe water and process of drinking water treatment … and does not delve into engineering design and calculations of water treatment.

That’s why:

- The course is suited for the non-specialist and provideshigh-quality and concentrated knowledge about the importance of safe drinking water and how drinking water treatment works.

- The course is not suited for professionals, engineers and researchers looking for calculations and designs of drinking water treatment processes.


- (No artificial intelligence tools (chatgpt, generative ai, prompts ..) were used in the development of this course, I believe this is important for providing an original learning experience for students).
targetAudiences: Sustainability Professionals, Consultants, ESG professionals, Anyone curious about rinking water treatment..

Throughout the course, you will master proven closing techniques that are essential for success. Techniques such as the assumptive close and the urgency close will be explored in depth, providing you with the confidence to guide conversations toward a successful outcome. Effective communication is at the heart of closing sales, and this course will teach you how to enhance your communication skills. You will discover the importance of active listening and how to employ persuasive language to engage prospects effectively. By practicing these techniques, you’ll not only build rapport but also create an environment where prospects feel valued and understood.


One of the key challenges in sales is overcoming objections. In this course, you’ll learn strategies for addressing common objections and turning them into opportunities for dialogue. By adopting a mindset that views objections as a chance to deepen your understanding of the prospect’s needs, you will transform potential roadblocks into stepping stones toward closing the sale.


Moreover, we will emphasize the critical importance of follow-up after closing the deal. You will learn how to maintain relationships with customers post-sale, ensuring their satisfaction and fostering loyalty. Engaging lessons, real-world examples, and actionable insights make this course a dynamic learning experience. Each module is designed to equip you with the tools you need to navigate the complexities of sales with confidence.


Join us on this transformative journey to become a more confident and effective closer. هل ترغب في معرفة كيف يمكن لأدوات الذكاء الاصطناعي الحديثة مثل ChatGPT أن تساعدك في كسب المال عبر الإنترنت؟ هذه الدورة هي فرصتك المثالية لاكتشاف كيفية استخدام هذه الأداة المذهلة لتحقيق النجاح المالي في عالم الإنترنت الواسع. مع ChatGPT، يمكنك تحسين مهاراتك في الكتابة، التسويق الرقمي، والتحليل البياني لتحقيق دخل مستدام والعمل بشكل أكثر كفاءة.


في هذه الدورة الشاملة، سنأخذك خطوة بخطوة عبر استراتيجيات مجربة وفعالة لاستخدام ChatGPT لتحقيق أهدافك المالية. سواء كنت مبتدئًا تمامًا في العمل عبر الإنترنت أو لديك خبرة سابقة وترغب في تحسين مهاراتك، ستجد في هذه الدورة كل ما تحتاجه لتبدأ وتنجح. سنغطي كل شيء بدءًا من الكتابة الجذابة، مرورًا بالاستراتيجيات التسويقية المتقدمة، وصولاً إلى تحسين محركات البحث (SEO) واستخدام ChatGPT لتحليل البيانات وزيادة الأداء.


ماذا ستتعلم في هذه الدورة؟


  • استخدام ChatGPT لكتابة محتوى جذاب وفعّال: تعلم كيفية إنتاج نصوص عالية الجودة في وقت قصير، سواء كانت مقالات، مدونات، أو نصوص تسويقية.

  • استراتيجيات التسويق بالعمولة: استكشف كيفية استخدام ChatGPT للترويج للمنتجات والخدمات عبر الإنترنت وكسب العمولات. تعلم كيف تختار المنتجات التي تناسب جمهورك وتكتب محتوى مميزًا يحفز المتابعين على الشراء.

  • تحسين محركات البحث (SEO): فهم كيفية تحسين ظهور محتواك على محركات البحث باستخدام ChatGPT. تعلم استراتيجيات البحث عن الكلمات الرئيسية وتحسين النصوص لتحقيق أفضل نتائج في البحث.

  • تحليل البيانات واستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي لتحسين استراتيجيات العمل: تعلم كيف يمكن لـ ChatGPT مساعدتك في تحليل البيانات واستخلاص الأفكار الرئيسية التي يمكن أن تحسن من استراتيجياتك التجارية.

  • التسويق الرقمي وبناء العلامة التجارية: تعلم كيفية بناء وتوسيع علامتك التجارية عبر الإنترنت من خلال أدوات ChatGPT. ستتعلم كيف يمكنك التفاعل مع جمهورك، إنشاء محتوى ملهم وجذاب، وزيادة التفاعل والمبيعات.


لماذا يجب عليك الانضمام إلى هذه الدورة؟


  • دورة شاملة وسهلة المتابعة: ستتمكن من تعلم كيفية استخدام ChatGPT من الألف إلى الياء، بدءًا من الأساسيات وصولًا إلى الاستراتيجيات المتقدمة. ستكون قادرًا على تطبيق هذه المهارات في حياتك المهنية اليومية لتحقيق نتائج ملموسة.

  • فرص لا حصر لها: باستخدام ChatGPT، يمكنك فتح مجموعة من الفرص في الكتابة، التسويق، خدمة العملاء، وتحليل البيانات. ستتمكن من تحسين عملك الشخصي أو حتى بدء عمل تجاري جديد عبر الإنترنت.

  • زيادة إنتاجيتك وتقليل الوقت المستغرق: ستتعلم كيف يمكن لـ ChatGPT مساعدتك في إنجاز المهام بسرعة ودقة، مما يتيح لك التركيز على جوانب أخرى من عملك أو حياتك الشخصية.

  • تحقيق دخل مستدام: سواء كنت تعمل في التسويق بالعمولة، كتابة المحتوى، أو تقديم استشارات، ستتمكن من استخدام ChatGPT لتحسين استراتيجياتك وزيادة دخلك عبر الإنترنت بشكل مستدام.

  • مناسب لجميع المستويات: سواء كنت مبتدئًا أو محترفًا، فإن هذه الدورة ستوفر لك الأدوات والمعرفة التي تحتاجها للنجاح في عالم العمل عبر الإنترنت.


محتوى الدورة: تتكون الدورة من 12 وحدة تعليمية، تحتوي كل وحدة على دروس تطبيقية وأمثلة حية. ستتعلم في هذه الدورة:


  1. كيفية كتابة محتوى مقنع باستخدام ChatGPT.

  2. طرق فعّالة لاستخدام ChatGPT في التسويق بالعمولة.

  3. استراتيجيات لتحسين محركات البحث وزيادة ظهور محتواك.

  4. كيفية استخدام ChatGPT لتحليل البيانات وتطوير استراتيجيات جديدة.

  5. كيفية بناء وتوسيع علامتك التجارية الشخصية باستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي.


من هو المستفيد من هذه الدورة؟


  • المبتدئون: إذا كنت مبتدئًا في العمل عبر الإنترنت، فإن هذه الدورة ستقدم لك المعرفة الأساسية التي تحتاجها للبدء في استخدام ChatGPT لتحقيق دخل إضافي.

  • المحترفون في التسويق الرقمي: إذا كنت بالفعل تعمل في التسويق أو الكتابة، فهذه الدورة ستساعدك على تحسين مهاراتك وزيادة كفاءتك باستخدام ChatGPT.

  • أصحاب الأعمال الحرة والمستقلين: ستتمكن من استخدام ChatGPT لتحسين عملك الحر، بدءًا من كتابة المحتوى، وصولًا إلى تقديم استشارات وتحسين محركات البحث.

courseDetails.title: RPA Project: Process Definition Document (PDD)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to design, compile and deliver the Process Definition Document - the most crucial document in any RPA project.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Many RPA/Automation courses focus on the technical - how to build actual bots or automated solutions. This series of courses focuses on how to manage this work - a vital skill often lacking in businesses today.

In this course, you are going to learn about the Process Definition Document (PDD). This is the most crucial document in any RPA project. It is the document that brings together all of the key strands of the project into one place. Much of the work that has been done previously will be compiled here, and presented in a way developers can digest. To successfully deliver an RPA project, a strong, clear and confident PDD is absolutely vital.

In the course, we will cover the following:

- What is RPA and how to define a process.

- What a PDD is - its features, sections and purpose.

- How to build out a PDD.

- How to pull together the process maps, business requirements and scope definitions into one format which developers can use to build the RPA solution.

Getting this document right is crucial, and that includes understanding the right way to present all of the information. As we run through the course, we will do so using a scenario example, case studies and practical exercises, all to ensure you know practically how to build out a PDD, and can try it out for yourself.
targetAudiences: Anyone working within a business process, producing some sort of output
Anyone working operationally within a business, working with multiple teams, activities or outputs
Anyone who wants to be able to gain RPA and automation skills in the field of process automation
Those looking to play a greater role in critical business projects today, and longer term

We will also run through a scenario example so you can see practically how to do this, but also feel confident to build out your own along the way.

In this course, we will cover:

- What is RPA, a process and requirements?

- Business requirements vs. Process requirements.

- How to sort your requirements using the MoSCoW method.

- How to create business requirements and process requirements documents.

- How to gather, sort and perfect your requirements to ensure the right solution is delivered.

At the end of this course, you will have full confidence to gather your business and process requirements to ensure you deliver an RPA solution to your process which will satisfy you, the team that delivers it and the wider business alike. This is a step so often missed by businesses, and leads to many problems further down the line within an RPA project. Avoid these problems altogether by enrolling on this course and getting those skills, today.

Course Description

What we're going to build:

— A token balance app where you enter a wallet address and get all the tokens in the wallet and all the token balances

— In addition to balances, fetch a detailed history of incoming and outgoing transfers of a particular token within a wallet.


What you will learn from this workshop:

— How to quickly build an app from scratch

— How to connect to blockchain

— How to use QuickNode Marketplace add-ons and Advanced APIs to quickly fetch and show blockchain data

— How to style your app


Building the Web3 Token Balance App: A Comprehensive Workshop

The world of technology is constantly evolving, and with the rise of blockchain and decentralized applications, understanding Web3 has become essential for anyone looking to stay relevant and competitive in the tech industry. This course, "Building the Web3 Token Balance App," offers a comprehensive journey into the world of Web3 and blockchain development. Through hands-on projects and practical guidance, participants will gain a deep understanding of Web3 concepts and how to apply them to create a functional token balance app.


In this immersive workshop, you will learn how to build a token balance app that allows users to enter a wallet address and retrieve information about all the tokens held in that wallet, along with their respective balances. Moreover, you will learn how to fetch a detailed history of incoming and outgoing transfers for a specific token within a wallet. By the end of this course, you will not only have a functional Web3 application but also the skills and knowledge needed to explore further possibilities in blockchain development.


Why Web3 is Important for Your Career

Web3 represents the future of the internet and offers exciting career opportunities. Understanding and mastering Web3 concepts can significantly enhance your career prospects. Here's why:


High Demand for Web3 Developers: As the adoption of blockchain technology and decentralized applications grows, there is a rising demand for developers who can build Web3 applications. Companies and startups in various industries are looking for talent with Web3 skills.


Innovation and Entrepreneurship: Web3 opens up new avenues for innovation and entrepreneurship. By building Web3 applications, you can create your own decentralized projects, collaborate with blockchain startups, or even develop your unique tokens or cryptocurrencies.


Decentralization and Security: Web3 applications operate on decentralized networks, making them more resistant to censorship and cyberattacks. Understanding Web3 technology can be crucial for building secure and resilient applications, which is a top priority for businesses and organizations.


Financial Opportunities: The blockchain industry has created new financial opportunities, including careers in cryptocurrency trading, token investment, and blockchain consulting. A solid understanding of Web3 is essential to navigate this space effectively.


In the rapidly evolving world of technology, Web3 is at the forefront of innovation. Building a career in Web3 development offers exciting opportunities in a wide range of industries, from finance to healthcare and beyond. This course, "Building the Web3 Token Balance App," equips you with the essential skills and knowledge needed to thrive in this dynamic field. Whether you aspire to work for leading blockchain companies, start your own Web3 project, or simply understand the technology shaping our future, this workshop is your gateway to success in the world of Web3 and blockchain development.
